author: yonik
msg: SOLR-236: refactor field collapsing, pull out of SolrIndexSearcher

author: johnh
msg: Adds support to gadgets.rpc for sending messages to a sibling IFRAME, rather than always to parent.
The syntax used to do so is to send a message to "/<siblingId>", fully enshrining "/" as an invalid character
in an IFRAME name/ID (as should already be the case).
Only window.postMessage is updated to support direct messaging in this way, in this CL. As such,
the support should be considered provisional, and used only by those who acknowledge this limitation.
Tested on Chrome 7, Firefox 3.6 and IE 8.
